library(tidyverse)

# U.S. Totals

## Cases

```{r us_total_cases}
nyt_us_total %>% 
  filter(date >= start_date) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = cases)) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  theme_covid +
  labs(title = str_glue("Cumulative Cases of Coronavirus in the U.S."),
       x = NULL,
       y = "Cumulative Cases")
```


```{r us_weekly_change}
nyt_us_total %>% 
  filter(date >= start_date) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = weekly_change)) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  theme_covid +
  labs(title = str_glue("Weekly Change in Cases of Coronavirus"),
       x = NULL,
       y = "New Cases in Last 7 Days")
```

# Stats by State


## Cases

```{r state_raw_cases}
gpdf <- nyt_state_df %>% 
  group_by(state) %>% 
  mutate(core = if_else(
           state %nin% top_n_state(nyt_state_df, n=7, wt = cases), "", 
           state 
           ),
         linesize = if_else(core == "", 0.5, 1),
         end_label = if_else(date == max(date), core, NA_character_)) %>% 
  ungroup()

gpdf %>% 
  filter(date >= start_date) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = cases, group = state, label = end_label, color = core)) +
  geom_line(aes(size = linesize, alpha = linesize)) +
  geom_text_repel(segment.color = NA, nudge_x = 2, nudge_y = 0.1) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  theme_covid +
  labs(title = str_glue("Cumulative Cases of Coronavirus by State"),
       x = NULL,
       y = "Cumulative Cases")
```
